query:
SELECT
                                ub.user_id,
                                ub.id,
                                ub.ban_type,
                                ub.reason,
                                ub.banned_at,
                                ub.expires_at,
                                uba.id as appeal_id,
                                uba.status as appeal_status,
                                uba.thread_id as appeal_thread_id
                            FROM user_bans ub
                            LEFT JOIN user_ban_appeals uba ON uba.ban_id = ub.id
                            WHERE ub.user_id = ANY($1)
                              AND ub.is_active = true
                              AND (ub.expires_at IS NULL OR ub.expires_at > NOW())
